definitions.definition: to buy or bring in products from another country:
examples: We import a large number of cars from Japan.

definitions.definition: to introduce new goods, customs, or ideas to one country from another:
examples: Jazz is an American modification of musical conventions imported from Europe.

definitions.definition: to copy information from one computer or computer program to another:
examples: I need to import data from the database into this spreadsheet.

definitions.definition: goods bought by one country from another:
the action of bringing goods or fashions into a country:
